data.name: Nura's Wish
data.detailed_description:
Description
Nura's Wish is an atmospheric puzzle adventure in which you carry the last light on the earth. Solve brilliant puzzles by illuminating ancient altars. Explore a mysterious world filled with riddles and secrets. Run and jump freely through diverse and open environments.

Features
  • Challenging Puzzles: Solve over 70 brilliant puzzles with the power of light and shadow.
  • Powerful Abilities: Learn and master the guardian's abilities for solving the most challenging puzzles.
  • Non-Linear Progression: Reawaken the guardian spirits, each one living in its own biome and having a unique set of puzzles to solve.
  • Exploration: Explore a mysterious world filled with collectible secrets. Learn more about the powers of the magical forest.
  • Platforming: Run and jump effortlessly across wide, open areas and explore fascinating world formations.

Is Nura's Wish for You?
You will love Nura's Wish if you enjoyed:
  • Atmospheric Adventure Games: Lost Ember, The First Tree, Spirit of the North, Journey, RIME
  • Puzzle Game Classics: The Witness, The Talos Principle, Portal

data.short_description: Nura's Wish is an atmospheric puzzle adventure in which you carry the last light on the earth. Solve brilliant puzzles by illuminating ancient altars. Explore a mysterious world filled with riddles and secrets. Run and jump freely through diverse and open environments.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“Definitely a very promising start. The art style is fantastic and has a very pleasant Journey-esque atmosphere. The puzzles are also very well implemented and do a great job of teaching you how structures in the world work while layering up the difficulty. Highly recommended.”
Alpha Beta Gamer

“The dense atmosphere creates an unforgettable experience. The The protagonist immediately pulls the player into the game. The unique background story is the basis for the emotional tone and the ecological story. It offers different platform sections for great fun. The composed adaptive soundtrack accompanies the gameplay and the story.”
Games and Poetry

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4GHz CPU Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 550 Ti 1GB/ Radeon 6950 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0GHz CPU Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 770 2GB / Radeon R9 280X 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
